hero.description: My vision of web development? Technology at the service of usability. It might sound obvious, but it is often overlooked. That's why I make it the core of my work: creating relevant solutions that deliver exactly the results expected of them.

ambition.title: Goals & Ambitions
ambition.text1: My ambition is to leverage digital tools for local craftsmanship. I want to enable artisans and small businesses to have a digital showcase that reflects the true quality of their work.
ambition.text2: It is this quest for legitimacy that guides my rigorous learning today: acquiring solid technical mastery to offer, tomorrow, a digital image worthy of their talent.

CabanesYourtesPage.title: Cabanes et Yourtes de la Vallée de l'Ance
CabanesYourtesPage.subtitle: Website for unique nature accommodations
aboutParagraphs: A personal project with a professional scope consisting of designing and developing the showcase website for the tourist accommodations 'Cabanes et Yourtes de la Vallée de l’Ance'. The site presents the lodgings, local activities, and availability, highlighting the natural and artisanal identity of the place.

I handled the entire process: needs analysis, zoning, wireframing, Figma mockups, frontend integration (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), and deployment. Development was done in continuous interaction with the owners to adjust content and design according to their feedback. The site is fully responsive and relies on a natural palette of green and brown tones. Site images were taken on location with RC Creation.
features: Responsive design adapted to all devices
Subtle animations to enhance user experience

IUTDefensePage.title: IUT Defense Management
IUTDefensePage.subtitle: Web application for managing internship evaluations for the IT Department
aboutParagraphs: A team project realized during the second year of the IT Degree. The objective was to design a web application centralizing the complete management of internship and apprenticeship defenses: jury assignment, entry and consultation of evaluation grids, grade tracking, account administration (professors, students), automation of internal tasks (emails, data uploads), as well as data security work.

I developed the professor's dashboard (personalized view of upcoming and past defenses, dynamic sorting) and handled the complete design integration (global CSS compliant with the IUT graphic charter).
A collaborative project lasting over a month using agile methodology, with GitHub for version control and VS Code for development.

admin: CSV export and automatic email sending
Creation and management of evaluation grids
student: Detailed view of grades by criteria

frontend: Design compliant with IUT graphic charter

UIDesignPosterPage.title: Album Cover CV
UIDesignPosterPage.subtitle: LinkedIn Campaign & Personal Branding - Concept Album
UIDesignPosterPage.heroImageAlt: Visual of the LinkedIn post album cover style
aboutParagraphs: As part of the "Personal and Professional Project" module, I designed a disruptive internship search campaign for April 2025. Rather than simply posting a PDF resume, I chose to treat my application like the release of a musical "debut single".

The concept relies on a strong analogy between music and code: rhythm, balance, and lack of dissonance. The main visual is a "stylized album cover" where standard CV information is graphically reinterpreted to catch recruiters' attention in a saturated LinkedIn feed.

strategy.title: Musical Storytelling
strategy.text: Full drafting of the post using a musical lexical field ("release", "mastering", "technical notes"). The idea was to present my frontend skills (HTML, CSS, JS) as a rigorous and harmonious composition.

strategy.title: Visual Design (Affinity)
strategy.text: Creation of a unique visual replacing the traditional CV. Information hierarchy formatted as a "Tracklist" for skills, album title for the targeted position, and credits for contact information.

keyFeatures: Skills Tracklist: Original presentation of hard skills (Web Dev).
"Release" Approach: Announcing the internship as an exclusive release from an emerging artist.
Design via Affinity: Mastery of graphic tools demonstrated through practice.
Double Impact: Simultaneous highlighting of technical skills (Affinity) and creative skills (the idea itself).

ClimbImprovePage.title: ClimbImprove
ClimbImprovePage.subtitle: Revolutionizing climbing through AI and IoT
aboutParagraphs: Realized in pairs as part of an English course in the second year of the IT Degree. ClimbImprove is a conceptual project aiming to revolutionize climbing by combining artificial intelligence and connected objects.

To cope with tight deadlines while exploring AI technologies, we used Figma Make to simulate the service architecture. My role consisted of imagining the global concept and fully developing the showcase website, the centerpiece of our booth evaluation.

This site details a complete ecosystem: an application capable of biomechanical video analysis ("Movement Analysis") and personalized coaching ("Smart Guidance"), coupled with sustainable connected holds made of wood and polyester.

mobile: Movement Analysis: Real-time biomechanical video analysis

design: Innovation: Product design combining AI and IoT
UX/UI Design: Creation of optimized interfaces on Figma
Figma Make AI: Simulation of complex processes
realization: Web Development: Creation of the complete showcase website
Communication: Presentation and sale of the concept in English
